name: Sudoku Classic+
description:
Classic Sudoku is a free sudoku game with four different sudoku games modes in one: Regular 9x9 puzzles, 3*3mini. Completely free with thousands of puzzles and endless supply. Classic Sudoku is a Sudoku like one you have never experienced before and the perfect app for exercising your brain!

Main Features:

- Four Sudoku game modes!
- Thousands of free sudoku puzzles!
- Get new puzzles daily!
- Complete goals.
- Unlimited undo feature.
- Get hints!


See what some of our many users have to say about this popular Classic Sudoku game:

- The game is perfect! Absolutely the best Sudoku I've ever played.
- Amazing game - five stars!
- I enjoy playing games and this one is beautiful. Simple clean. And yet a challenge!
- Great app! I love it so much!
- The best Sudoku!!Best game out there!
- Once you start playing it is hard to stop!
- Great fun and challenging!

Download the Classic Sudoku game TODAY and see for yourself why so many others are deeply attracted by this challenging game!
